thread.section_title: Hotel Le 123 Elysees - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming Hotel -
thread.title_full: Charming Hotel - Review of Hotel Le 123 Elysees - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: louisebW259WU
title: Charming Hotel -
text:
Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in March 2017!
It really is a charming hotel, the staff are exceptional and cannot do enough to help!
The hotel is exceptionally clean in all areas from rooms, restaurants and bathrooms!
The free bar from 1pm is great to have a drink and a snack to recharge your batteries and set off again. Breakfast is a plentiful and caters for all dietary requirements, as a vegetarian I certainly didn't have any trouble and the staff again were exceptionally helpful in translating labels to put my mind at rest.
The staff really do make this hotel the gem that it is and management should be extremely proud of them all.
The only thing that could make this hotel any better would be being able to buy an alcoholic drink over the bar and a few more English to channels but that really is me being picky to find something.
